app.description: Injects a pedigree (.ped) file in the VCF header

option.name: cleanPreviousPedigree
option.description: Remove all previous data about pedigree in the VCF header before adding the new one.

option.name: ignoreMissingInHeader
option.description: Ignore errors if a sample is declared in the pedigree but is missing in the VCF header

option.name: ignoreMissingInPedigree
option.description: Ignore errors if a sample is declared in the VCF header but is missing in the pedigree

app.documentation:
This tools reads a pedigree file and inject it in the VCF header
$ java -jar dist/vcfinjectpedigree.jar \ -imih -imip -p input.ped \ input.vcf.gz > out.vcf
$ grep Sample out.vcf (...) ##Sample=<Family=F1,ID=INDI1,Father=0,Mother=0,Sex=1,Status=1> ##Sample=<Family=F2,ID=INDI2,Father=0,Mother=0,Sex=2,Status=1> ##Sample=<Family=F3,ID=INDI3,Father=INDI1,Mother=INDI2,Sex=1,Status=1> (...)
